橪橪橪

橪字的基本解释

橪
rǎn
古书上说的一种枣：“黄甘橙楱，枇杷橪柿”。
染。

橪
yān
〔橪支〕ａ．古书上说的一种香草；ｂ．古书上说的一种树。均亦称“撚支”。

橪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［rǎn］
［《廣韻》人善切，上獮，日。］
酸枣。
[②]［yān］
［《廣韻》烏前切，平先，影。］
亦作“撚2”。
见“橪2支”。

橪字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　橪； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页555第05
【唐韻】人善切【集韻】【韻會】忍善切，?然上聲。【說文】酸小棗也。【司馬相如·上林賦】枇杷橪?。　又【說文】撚，染也。　又【唐韻】烏前切【集韻】因蓮切，?音煙。橪支，香草也。【劉向·九歎】采橪支于中洲。

橪字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
橪字的起名意思

古书上说的一种香草；古书上说的一种树。

Purle
Basic explanation of words
Purle
rǎn
A kind of jujube said in ancient books: "Yellow Gancheng Tang, Loquat Persimmon".
dye.
Purle
yān
[Purple] a. A kind of vanilla mentioned in ancient books; b. A kind of tree mentioned in ancient books. Both are also called "twisted branches".
Purle
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［rǎn］
["Guangyun" people are good at cutting, go up, day. ]
Jujube.
[②]［yān］
["Guangyun" Wuqianqie, Pingxian, shadow. ]
Also known as "twist 2".
See "2 Spurs".
Purle
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　橪; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 555 05
[Tang Yun] People are good at cutting [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Tolerant and cut, then sound. [Said the text] also jujube. 【Sima Xiangru·Shanglin Fu】Loquat?.　[Said the text] Twist and dye.　 [Tang Yun] Wu Qianqie [Ji Yun] Because of lotus cutting, sound smoke. Spurs, vanilla too. [Liu Xiang·Jiu Tan] Picking the stalks in Zhongzhou.
